name: r2sql-shell
description: Interactive REPL for querying R2 Data Catalog with R2 SQL

scripts.package:macos: npm run bundle && pkg dist/bundle.cjs --targets node18-macos-x64 --output ./bin/r2sql-shell-macos
scripts.package:linux: npm run bundle && pkg dist/bundle.cjs --targets node18-linux-x64 --output ./bin/r2sql-shell-linux
scripts.package:windows: npm run bundle && pkg dist/bundle.cjs --targets node18-win-x64 --output ./bin/r2sql-shell-win.exe
scripts.package:all: npm run package:macos && npm run package:linux && npm run package:windows
